Semitic  

ğ“‚œğ“ nought < Not, nolde (would not) â€¢nulet < ğ“…“ğ“‚‹ğ“‚ > **let** > least la'is Ù„ÙŠØ³ lass less lack ğ“‚œğ“ˆ–
